page.title: 07Stonegate Village Hall
page.content: Stonegate Village Hall was built just over 20 years ago.It is situated near the centre of the village and is the meeting place for several organisations. The Women's Institute, Stonegate Youth Club, Badminton Club and The Mothers and Toddlers Group are all based at the Village Hall. There are Adult Education classes in upholstery and keep fit. The local primary school,not having a hall or gymnasium of its own,uses the Village Hall for physical education lessons and concerts. From time to time village activities take place in the hall,including barn dances,village concerts and flower shows. The hall is also available for people wishing to organise a disco ,party or wedding reception.
